New Records: South Africa have won all three matches and are on brink of Super 8s
Key Match Events: Hridoy falls lbw to Rabada late on; Mahmudullah caught trying to hit six to win the match
South Africa post 113-6: Klaasen 46, Miller 29; Tanzim 3-18
Maharaj bowled three full tosses in the final over, but Bangladesh did not find the boundary off any of them
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Aiden Markram: "I think it got pretty nerve racking in the final over and it can make you mentally tired"
Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto: "I think this is a match we should have won"
Player of the match Heinrich Klaasen: "It was not a nice one to watch, it was good that the boys got it over the line."
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto: "I think this is a match we should have won"
Player of the match Heinrich Klaasen: "It'll be good confidence for the boys, we've had three pressurised games now"
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alex Hartley Former England bowler on BBC Sounds: "It's just tough for both sides to bat on this pitch and every game we've had have been low-scoring thrillers."
